title: REF font
content:
Working on some hardcopy products for the upcoming holidays. Need to know which this company 'REF' uses (see attachment). Get in the holidaycheer and try to help me out here :P

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ref\_font.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164212/http:/typophile.com/files/ref_font.gif) | 3.2 KB |
author: Chris82

comments.content:
You're right, thank you.  
Another f\*cking commercial font :S

[www.futuredesign.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164212/http:/www.futuredesign.nl/ "www.futuredesign.nl")

Heaven forbid you have to pay for a product that somebody put time and effort into creating :-S

- Lex

P.S. It's not exactly Digital Sans. The 'R' is off.

\> Another f\*cking commercial font

Man, this is for sure the wrongest place to say something like that.

Another jerk who doesn't want to pay for something. :^)

Nick Cooke

Come on guys, don't be so tough on John Do. The guy lives in Amsterdam, probably spending all his 'Do' on blow… : )

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
